dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4727 IH: To codify Executive Order 14235 relating to restoring public service loan forgiveness.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Self introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14235 relating to restoring public service loan forgiveness.

section.text: Executive Order 14235 (90 Fed. Reg. 11885; relating to restoring public service loan forgiveness) shall have the force and effect of law.
